ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 13 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:

<4> Zeikos 50" Compact Tripod + <5> Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter + <6> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash +
<7> PD-C20 Camera/Camcorder Case + <8> HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <9> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader +
<10> PD 5pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <11> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <12> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors + <13> Image Recovery Software
